Construct an iterator.

@1@ Default constructor. [[cpp/language/value_initialization|Value-initializes]] the underlying data members:
* {{rlpi|/#Data members|current_}} with {{c|ranges::iterator_t&lt;Base&gt;()}},
* {{rlpi|/#Data members|last_ele_}} with {{c|ranges::iterator_t&lt;Base&gt;()}} (note that this member may not be present),
* {{rlpi|/#Data members|n_}} with {{c|0}}.

@2@ Conversion from {{c|/*iterator*/&lt;false&gt;}} to {{c|/*iterator*/&lt;true&gt;}}. Initializes the underlying data members:
* {{rlpi|/#Data members|current_}} with {{box|{{c/core|std::}}{{ltt|cpp/utility/move}}{{c/core|(i.current_)}}}},
* {{rlpi|/#Data members|n_}} with {{c|i.n_}}.
Note that {{c|/*iterator*/&lt;true&gt;}} can only be formed when {{rlpi|/#Member types|Base}} models {{c|/*slide-caches-nothing*/}}, in which case {{rlpi|/#Data members|last_ele_}} is not present.

@3@ A private constructor which is used by {{lc|ranges::slide_view::begin}} and {{lc|ranges::slide_view::end}}. This constructor is not accessible to users. Initializes the underlying data members:
* {{rlpi|/#Data members|current_}} with {{c|current}},
* {{rlpi|/#Data members|n_}} with {{c|n}}.
Note that this overload can only be present if {{rlpi|/#Data members|last_ele_}} is not present.

@4@ A private constructor which is used by {{lc|ranges::slide_view::begin}} and {{lc|ranges::slide_view::end}}. This constructor is not accessible to users. Initializes the underlying data members:
* {{rlpi|/#Data members|current_}} with {{c|current}},
* {{rlpi|/#Data members|last_ele_}} with {{c|last_ele}} (note that this data member is present due to {{c|/*slide-caches-first*/&lt;Base&gt;}} requirement),
* {{rlpi|/#Data members|n_}} with {{c|n}}.
